name: Dash In, Gash Out
simple_desc: Deals Lightning DMG to a single enemy, and launches Talent's follow-up attack.
desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to #1[i]% of Moze's ATK to a single target enemy, and launches the Talent's follow-up attack against this target. If the target is defeated before this follow-up attack is used, then launches the follow-up attack against a random single enemy instead.
